name: uncloud
description: Uncloud is a self-hosted centralized cloud account manager that aggregates multiple cloud storage providers, giving a unified view and operations from a single web interface.
features: Multi-provider support: Connect multiple cloud storage providers like Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneDrive.
Unified interface: Access all cloud accounts through a single web interface without switching between services.
File browsing: Browse files across all connected cloud storage providers in one consolidated view.
Account aggregation: See total storage usage and available space across all connected accounts.
File operations: Perform file operations like copy, move, and delete across different cloud providers.
Search: Search for files across all connected cloud storage accounts from one search box.
Transfer management: Move files between different cloud providers without downloading locally.
Centralized access: Manage all cloud storage accounts from one location for simplified organization.
Privacy-focused: Keep cloud credentials on your own server without third-party access.
Web-based: Access your cloud storage manager from any device with a web browser.
Account monitoring: Monitor storage usage and quotas across all connected providers.
Simple setup: Connect cloud accounts with OAuth authentication for secure access.
